  • Method Details

    • suspend

      public void suspend()
      Suspends the running thread; variable suspended set to true and isRunning to false, initializes suspendedTime to current time at suspension and prints out statement

    • resume

      public void resume()
      Resumes the running thread; variable suspended set to false and isRunning to true, initializes resumeTime to current time at resumption and calculates the suspendedDuration time. Loops through events in eventList and updates eventTime with added suspendedDuration. Prints out statement and wakes all threads

    • getRunning

      public boolean getRunning()
      Returns isRunning boolean true/false
      Returns:
      boolean true or false

    • getSuspended

      public boolean getSuspended()
      Returns suspended boolean true/false
      Returns:
      boolean true or false

    • addEvent

      public void addEvent(Event event)
      Adds event to eventList
      Parameters:
      event - event to be added, read from file

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Prints out statement closing controls

    • getEventList

      public List<Event> getEventList()
      Returns eventList
      Returns:
      eventList

    • setEventList

      public void setEventList(List<Event> eventList)
      Sets an eventList
      Parameters:
      eventList - passed eventList to set

    • run

      public void run()
      Sets isRunning to true, utilizes ExecutorService to manage a thread pool of Event objects. If suspended, thread pool execution is paused, otherwise, loops through eventList with the executor and runs the run() method of Event for each event then removes the event from the list. Shuts down executor and sets isRunning to false.
